common.name: Cowboys
common.effect: If holding pocket Kings (KK), gain +5 points.

common.name: Ducks
common.effect: If holding pocket 2s (22), gain +4 points.

common.name: Snowmen
common.effect: If holding pocket 8s (88), gain +4 points.

common.name: Big Slick
common.effect: If holding Ace and King, suited or not, gain +5 points.

common.name: The Hammer
common.effect: If holding 7-2 offsuit, gain +8 points if you win the hand.

common.name: The Wheel
common.effect: If you complete a 5-high straight (A-2-3-4-5), gain +6 points.

common.name: Motown
common.effect: If your hand includes J-5, gain +3 points.

common.name: Presto
common.effect: If holding pocket 5s (55), gain +4 points.

common.name: Dead Man's Hand
common.effect: If you hold A♠ and 8♠, gain +6 points.

common.name: The Doyle
common.effect: If holding 10-2, gain +5 points if you win the hand.

uncommon.name: Blaze
uncommon.effect: If all your cards are face cards (JQK), gain +10 points.

uncommon.name: Bookends
uncommon.effect: If your hole cards are Ace and 2, gain +6 points.

uncommon.name: Slickback
uncommon.effect: If your hole cards are King and Queen suited, gain +7 points.

uncommon.name: The Brunson
uncommon.effect: If holding 10-2 and make two pair, gain +10 points.

uncommon.name: The Grinder
uncommon.effect: Gain +2 points every round you make it to showdown.

uncommon.name: Big Chick
uncommon.effect: If holding Ace-Queen, gain +6 points.

uncommon.name: The Pistol
uncommon.effect: If holding 9-9, gain +6 points.

uncommon.name: Sailboats
uncommon.effect: If holding 4-4, gain +5 points.

uncommon.name: Quack Quack
uncommon.effect: Gain +2 points every time a 2 appears on the board.

uncommon.name: One-Eyed Jack
uncommon.effect: If holding J♠ or J♥ (the one-eyed jacks), gain +5 points.

rare.name: Fishhooks
rare.effect: If holding pocket Jacks (JJ), gain +15 points.

rare.name: The Rocket
rare.effect: If holding pocket Aces (AA), gain +20 points.

rare.name: Four Horsemen
rare.effect: If you make Four of a Kind, gain +25 bonus points.

rare.name: Sneaky Straight
rare.effect: If your straight is made with hole cards, gain +15 points.

rare.name: Flush Rush
rare.effect: If you complete a flush with at least one hole card, gain +12 points.

rare.name: Lucky Runout
rare.effect: If you improve on the river, gain +10 bonus points.

rare.name: Pocket Monster
rare.effect: Any pocket pair gains +6 additional points.

rare.name: Deep Stack
rare.effect: Gain +3 points for each previous round you've survived.

rare.name: Hot Streak
rare.effect: If you won the last hand, gain +10 extra points.

rare.name: Comeback Kid
rare.effect: If you lost the last hand, gain +10 extra points.

legendary.name: Ace in the Hole
legendary.effect: Once per game, turn any one hole card into an Ace of any suit before showdown.

legendary.name: The Chameleon
legendary.effect: Once per hand, treat one of your hole cards as a wildcard matching any rank needed for your best hand.

legendary.name: Time Traveler
legendary.effect: Once per game, view all community cards one turn early and undo your last fold.

legendary.name: All-In Instinct
legendary.effect: Automatically win ties when going all-in with a made hand.

legendary.name: Royal Favor
legendary.effect: Gain +30 bonus points if your final hand is a Royal Flush.

unique.name: The Dealer
unique.effect: You may choose the turn or river card once per game from a set of 3 options.

unique.name: Ghost Hand
unique.effect: Once per round, play with a hidden third hole card. Only you can see and use it.

unique.name: Fatebinder
unique.effect: Lock your hand from changes once per round to prevent bad draws or burn cards.

common.name: Diamond Dazzle
common.effect: All Diamond cards give +2 points.

common.name: Heartwarming
common.effect: All Heart cards give +2 points.

common.name: Club Crawl
common.effect: All Club cards give +2 points.

common.name: Spade Surge
common.effect: All Spade cards give +2 points.

common.name: Pair Up
common.effect: Every pair made gives +3 points.

common.name: Triple Threat
common.effect: Three of a Kind gives +4 points.

common.name: Quads Boost
common.effect: Four of a Kind gives +6 points.

common.name: Flush Bonus
common.effect: Flushes gain +4 points.

common.name: Straight Reward
common.effect: Straights gain +3 points.

common.name: Full House Feast
common.effect: Full Houses gain +5 points.

common.name: Rank 2 Power
common.effect: Each 2s on the board gives +1 point.

common.name: Rank 3 Power
common.effect: Each 3s on the board gives +1 point.

common.name: Rank 4 Power
common.effect: Each 4s on the board gives +1 point.

common.name: Rank 5 Power
common.effect: Each 5s on the board gives +1 point.

common.name: Rank 6 Power
common.effect: Each 6s on the board gives +1 point.

common.name: Rank 7 Power
common.effect: Each 7s on the board gives +1 point.

common.name: Rank 8 Power
common.effect: Each 8s on the board gives +1 point.

common.name: Rank 9 Power
common.effect: Each 9s on the board gives +1 point.

common.name: Rank 10 Power
common.effect: Each 10s on the board gives +1 point.

common.name: Rank J Power
common.effect: Each Js on the board gives +1 point.

common.name: Rank Q Power
common.effect: Each Qs on the board gives +1 point.

common.name: Rank K Power
common.effect: Each Ks on the board gives +1 point.

common.name: Rank A Power
common.effect: Each As on the board gives +1 point.

uncommon.name: Dual Threat
uncommon.effect: If the board allows two possible straights, all straights gain +8 points.

uncommon.name: Flush Lane
uncommon.effect: If four cards of the same suit are on the board, flushes gain +10 points.

uncommon.name: Paired Up
uncommon.effect: If the board contains two pairs, Full Houses gain +10 points.

uncommon.name: Middle Madness
uncommon.effect: If the turn card is a 6, 7, or 8, all hands gain +4 points.

uncommon.name: Suited Speed
uncommon.effect: If three suited cards appear on the flop, gain +6 points.

uncommon.name: Edge Flush
uncommon.effect: If the flush uses both your hole cards, gain +12 points.

uncommon.name: Climbing High
uncommon.effect: If all board cards are above 9, all hands gain +5 points.

uncommon.name: Split River
uncommon.effect: If river pairs the board, all players gain +6 points.

uncommon.name: Three's Company
uncommon.effect: If board shows three of one suit, gain +4 points.

uncommon.name: Full Range
uncommon.effect: If the board includes both an Ace and a 2, all hands gain +6 points.

uncommon.name: Sharp Turn
uncommon.effect: If the turn card creates a possible straight, all players gain +5 points.

uncommon.name: Flood Warning
uncommon.effect: If 4 or more suited cards on board, all players gain +8 points.

uncommon.name: Boardquake
uncommon.effect: If three or more of the same rank appear, +10 to all.

uncommon.name: Trap Set
uncommon.effect: If the board is rainbow and unpaired, all hands gain +4 points.

uncommon.name: Royal Setup
uncommon.effect: If the board contains J, Q, K, A, all hands gain +8 points.

uncommon.name: High Society
uncommon.effect: If all community cards are face cards, +10 to all players.

uncommon.name: Low Ladder
uncommon.effect: If the board contains 3 or more cards under 6, +6 to all.

uncommon.name: Frozen Flop
uncommon.effect: If the flop is rainbow, +3 to all hands using all 3 cards.

uncommon.name: Kicker Clash
uncommon.effect: If a hand is won by kicker, that player gains +8 points.

uncommon.name: Suit Storm
uncommon.effect: All cards of most common suit on board give +2 extra points.
